metadata.title: USN-5215-1 -- NLTK vulnerability
metadata.description: Srikantha Prathi discovered that NLTK incorrectly handled specially crafted input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5215-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-nltk - 3.4.5-2ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
